titleStmt.title: The fickle northern lass, or, The wronged shepherds resolution ... Tune of, There was a lass in the north country, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, and Clarke,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing, which gives publication date as 1674-1679.
Verse -- "There was a lass in the north country,".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
